scripts.install:emsdk: cd emsdk && emsdk install sdk-2.0.5-64bit && emsdk activate sdk-2.0.5-64bit
scripts.build:wasm: cd emsdk && emsdk_env && cd .. && emcc -std=c++14 -pedantic-errors -Wall -Wextra -Werror -Wno-long-long -s STANDALONE_WASM -s NO_DYNAMIC_EXECUTION=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=1 --minify 0 -s INVOKE_RUN=1 -s FILESYSTEM=0 -s EXPORT_NAME=emscriptenTest --pre-js source/pre.js -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_malloc', '_free']" -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="['stackAlloc', 'stackSave', 'stackRestore', 'stringToUTF8', 'UTF8ArrayToString']" -O3 -lm -o dist/emscripten-test.js source/main.cpp
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:wasm && npm run build:umd
